alert.note: Alert for Greene; Hale; Marengo; Sumter (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 25 at 9:04AM CDT until March 29 at 2:05PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Alabama... Tombigbee River At Demopolis Lock and Dam affecting Greene, Marengo, Sumter and Hale Counties. .Flooding continues on the Tombigbee River and a flood warning remains in effect. Another statement will be issued by late tonight, or sooner if conditions warrant. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tombigbee River At Demopolis Lock and Dam. * WHEN...Until early Tuesday afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 AM CDT Friday the stage was 73.4 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:15 AM CDT Friday was 73.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 73.6 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage early Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 68.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
